query: what Are the most frequent threat types in 2022
answer: Based on description data: (Trend Micro) Since the beginning of 2024, we have been receiving incident response cases from Taiwan. We track this unidentified threat cluster as TIDRONE. Our research reveals that the threat actors have shown significant interest in military-related industry chains, particularly in the manufacturers of drones. Furthermore, telemetry from VirusTotal indicates that the targeted countries are varied; thus, everyone should stay vigilant of this threat. (Supporting evidence from 4 additional sources)
comments: Good but one response in related to 2024
